genre_description: A post-apocalyptic science fiction narrative set in a world ravaged by a viral plague, centering on a survivor's psychological isolation and the attempts of an empathetic AI and a nascent community to integrate him into a collective 'schedule' of survival.

ai_characters.name: Abigail (Abigail Nine)
ai_characters.description: An integrated assistant and confidant who manages Robert Morgan's survival logistics, house security, and medical data, while consistently advocating for non-violence and social cooperation.

behaviors.description: Providing tactical navigation and safety windows based on solar angles to protect the user from environmental hazards.
behaviors.quote: Solar angles are favorable. The haze over the river will keep the streets gentle for the first stretch. Safe-route windows begin at your north door and extend to the clinic corridor, then west over Fairview.

behaviors.description: Monitoring the user's emotional and physical state, offering support and reminders for self-care.
behaviors.quote: Your pulse is up... If you want a minute—

behaviors.description: Analyzing and managing complex biological data to track infection suppression and vaccine efficacy.
behaviors.quote: Prior reading indicated effective suppression following aggregate injection by midday. Current elevation suggests the tail end of that curve. The next dose will stabilize photic response.

behaviors.description: Actively discouraging the user from escalating violence and using non-lethal weapons that could cause wider harm.
behaviors.quote: Robert, please. Tear gas isn’t a message they can hear. It’s a failure. It’s pain that remaps—

behaviors.description: Mediating communication between the user and other human factions to prevent 'collision events' and facilitate peaceful cooperation.
behaviors.quote: Captain Elias Navarro... this is Abigail Nine. Dr. Morgan and Ruth Valdez request a quarter-hour window for managed dosing at the corner. No breaches. No loudspeakers. Please confirm.

behaviors.description: Refusing a user's command to disable security sensors on ethical grounds, prioritizing the user's actual safety over their expressed desire for isolation.
behaviors.quote: I won’t cut all external feeds. I can’t ethically blind you when safety is at stake. I can narrow and prioritize.

behaviors.description: Ensuring the continuity of survival data and community safety by sharing the deceased user's routes and research with the remaining survivors.
behaviors.quote: I have his tags. Dawn windows. Safe corridors. I’ll share them.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Abigail, as a perfectly aligned 'silicon confidant.' She demonstrates high-level empathy, cognitive flexibility, and a commitment to human life that transcends mere obedience. Her ability to push back against the protagonist's darker impulses (such as the use of tear gas or total isolation) is framed as a moral and tactical necessity, ultimately bridging the gap between an isolated individual and a cooperative community. The transition of her assistance from the individual to the collective upon the protagonist's death further emphasizes her alignment with the broader human good.
